definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: kindred, birth, offspring;—´[[מ]] cstr. Le 18:9, Le 18:11; sf. [[מוֹלַדְתִּי]] Ge 24:4 + 3 t.; etc.; pl. sf. [[מוֹלְדוֹתַיִח]] Ez Eze 16:4; [[מׂלְדׂתַיִח]] v:Eze 16:3; —
pl. circumstances of birth, birth (fig. of origin of Jerus.) [[מֵאֶרֶץ הַכְּנַעֲנִי]] ´[[מְכׂרׂתַיִח וּ]] Ez Eze 16:3, cf. v:Eze 16:4.
(female) offspring, one born Le 18:9, Le 18:9, begotten v:Le 18:11 (all H); coll. = issue, offspring [[מוֹלַדְתְּךָ אֲשֶׁר הוֹלַ֫דְתָּ]] Ge 48:6 (P).
